title: OpenClaw (Moltbot, Clawdbot) Alternatives: We Tested The 9 Best Tools
content: We tested the 9 Best OpenClaw Alternatives OpenClaw (formerly Clawdbot, or Moltbot) showed many people what an agentic AI assistant could look like: a system that doesn't just chat, but can act across tools, remember context, and run workflows. For developers and power users, that promise is exciting. For others, the reality comes with friction. Many people start looking for the best ...
